description:
When a non-raw image is spawned, its kernel and ramdisk are stored in the /boot/guest directory in dom0's filesystem. 
These files should be cleaned up when the instance is terminated. 

Kernel and ramdisk files can be found looking up the PV_kernel and PV_ramdisk fields of the VM record.
title: xenapi: kernel/ramdisk not removed on instance termination
